sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' import '../ProductDisplay/ProductDisplay.css' import star_icon from '../assets/star_icon.png' import star_dull_icon from '../assets/star_dull_icon.png' export const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const {product} = props const [quantity,setQuantity] = useState(Number(1)); const [prevQuantity,setPrevQuantity]=useState(Number(1)); React.useEffect(() => { setPrevQuantity(quantity); },prevQuantity, [quantity]); const [cart,AddToCart] = useState({}); const SetAmountManual = (e)=>{ setQuantity(/* the condition allows the input box to not contain 0 or Nan error when manually typing */ prevQuantity>1?Number(e.target.value):Number(1)) AddToCart({Id:Number(product.id),amount:Number(e.target.value)})} const SetAmountMinus = (e) => quantity<=Number(1)?setQuantity(Number(1)):setQuantity(quantity-Number(1)) return (

{product.name}

(122)

${product.old_price}
${product.new_price*quantity}
nice shirt

Select Size

S
L
XL
XXL

Select Quantity

- setQuantity(quantity+Number(1))}>+

Category: Women,T-Shirt,Crop-Top

Tags: Modern,Latest

) }
